thread.title: Can You Pass This Lie Detector Test
thread.title_full: Can You Pass This Lie Detector Test

author: Sarah Aspler
title: Can You Pass This Lie Detector Test
text:
View this image › 
BuzzFeed / Getty ID: 10731451 2. Read the image below and try your best to remember everything. You will soon be tested on this information. The image will only be visible for 30 seconds. ID: 10731083 Start Time's up! View this embed › 
ID: 10730895 4. The police are now questioning you about what happened on Tuesday. Your mission is to get through the test WITHOUT exposing the fact that you’re guilty of the crime. ID: 10731384 5. Got it? Let’s see if you can keep your story straight. ID: 10731389 BuzzFeed / Getty BuzzFeed / Getty BuzzFeed / Getty The park My cousin’s house The beach BuzzFeed / Getty The one near the bank The one near the beach The one near my best friend’s house BuzzFeed / Getty Morgan Mitchell Mason BuzzFeed / Getty Samuels Simpson Smith BuzzFeed / Getty BuzzFeed / Getty The park The coffee shop At work BuzzFeed / Getty Can You Pass This Lie Detector Test? Uh oh. You got caught. Maybe it was a slip of memory or you just choked under the pressure of this fake scenario. Either way, you’re not keeping that 50 grand! Sorry!
Fox You didn’t get caught but you’re still a suspect. You slipped up a couple times but only on the small details.
TLC You got away with it! You’re a master of deception. You kept your story straight and get to keep $50,000. Just don’t go on a shopping spree. That might look a lil’ suspicious, you know?
NBC SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10731637 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
